text: Hi there, we've been working on a custom quote template for 1 week trying to change the Paper Size of the PDF (only) from A4 to US letter...but it seems to be impossible. Have you ever experienced the same problem or maybe found a workaround?

Hey folks, ever spent time troubleshooting your dnd code and thought it would be handy to *see the dnd elements visualized on your front-end?* How about diagraming out what your dnd structure should look like for a project?

I made something for ya:
<https://youtu.be/RUs24n8DfzA>
(links to the tools in the video description)
